io.micronaut.cli.io.support

Class UrlResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.cli.io.support.AbstractFileResolvingResource
      • io.micronaut.cli.io.support.UrlResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource

    public class UrlResource
extends AbstractFileResolvingResource
    Resource implementation for java.net.URL locators. Obviously supports resolution as URL, and also as File in case of the "file:" protocol.
    Since:
    28.12.2003
    Author:
    Juergen Hoeller
    See Also:
    URL

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Resource createRelative(String relativePath)
      This implementation creates a UrlResource, applying the given path relative to the path of the underlying URL of this resource descriptor.
      boolean equals(Object obj)
      This implementation compares the underlying URL references.
      String getDescription()
      This implementation returns a description that includes the URL.
      File getFile()
      This implementation returns a File reference for the underlying URL/URI, provided that it refers to a file in the file system.
      String getFilename()
      This implementation returns the name of the file that this URL refers to.
      InputStream getInputStream()
      This implementation opens an InputStream for the given URL.
      URI getURI()
      This implementation returns the underlying URI directly, if possible.
      URL getURL()
      This implementation returns the underlying URL reference.
      int hashCode()
      This implementation returns the hash code of the underlying URL reference.

    • Method Detail

      • getInputStream

        public InputStream getInputStream()
                           throws IOException
        This implementation opens an InputStream for the given URL. It sets the "UseCaches" flag to false, mainly to avoid jar file locking on Windows.
        Returns:
        The input stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error
        See Also:
        URL.openConnection(), URLConnection.setUseCaches(boolean), URLConnection.getInputStream()

      • getURL

        public URL getURL()
           throws IOException
        This implementation returns the underlying URL reference.
        Returns:
        The URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error

      • getURI

        public URI getURI()
           throws IOException
        This implementation returns the underlying URI directly, if possible.
        Returns:
        The URI
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem getting the URI

      • getFile

        public File getFile()
             throws IOException
        This implementation returns a File reference for the underlying URL/URI, provided that it refers to a file in the file system.
        Specified by:
        getFile in interface Resource
        Overrides:
        getFile in class AbstractFileResolvingResource
        Returns:
        The file
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem getting the file

      • createRelative

        public Resource createRelative(String relativePath)
        This implementation creates a UrlResource, applying the given path relative to the path of the underlying URL of this resource descriptor.
        Parameters:
        relativePath - The path
        Returns:
        The resource for the path
        See Also:
        URL.URL(java.net.URL, String)

      • getFilename

        public String getFilename()
        This implementation returns the name of the file that this URL refers to.
        Returns:
        The filename
        See Also:
        URL.getFile(), File.getName()

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
        This implementation returns a description that includes the URL.

        The description
